At 17:34 31/07/02 +0100, Liam Bedford wrote:
>fdisk /mbr will restore a dos MBR.. it'll leave the partitions alone.


Will clear the Partition table entries in the MBR if it does not end with 
valid Boot signature.

Regards Ger
